revised_title: Challenges and Opportunities in Implementing Family Planning Programs
tldr: This article discusses the challenges and opportunities in implementing family planning programs worldwide. It highlights the need for improved management and expanded options for fertility regulation. The author emphasizes the importance of political will, technical insights, and the elimination of redundant activities to meet the demand for family planning services. The article also explores the hierarchy of acceptability of contraceptives and the potential impact of different methods on population control.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences > Demography and Population Studies
